# RealWorld Agent Experiment Laboratory

This directory contains the experimental setup for the Bachelor Thesis.

## Goal
To measure the impact of a **Governance Framework** on the ability of an AI Agent to correctly implement the RealWorld Backend specification.

## Structure
*   `spec/`: Contains the OpenAPI/Swagger definition of the RealWorld App.
*   `harness/`: The custom Test Runner and Governance logic (The "Supervisor").
*   `implementations/`:
    *   `baseline/`: Code generated by the "Unmanaged" agent.
    *   `governed/`: Code generated by the "Managed" agent.

## Stack
*   **Runtime:** Bun
*   **Framework:** Hono
*   **Database:** PostgreSQL + Drizzle ORM
*   **Testing:** Bun Test (Custom runner)

## How to Run
(TBD - Will contain scripts to launch agents and run benchmarks)
